login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account
login.welcomeDescription: Access your dashboard, manage products, and connect with customers in your city.

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Choose your account type and get started
register.name: Name (Optional)
register.joinDescription: Connect with customers, grow your business, and become part of a thriving city marketplace.
register.forStoresDesc: Reach local customers and manage your online presence
register.forCustomersDesc: Discover and save your favorite local products

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.emailSent: If an account exists with {email}, you will receive a password reset link shortly.
forgotPassword.checkSpam: Please check your spam folder if you don't see the email within a few minutes.
forgotPassword.heading: Forgot Your Password?
forgotPassword.description: No worries. Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

resetPassword.title: Set New Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter a new password for {email}
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
resetPassword.heading: Set New Password
resetPassword.description: Choose a strong password to secure your account and keep your information safe.

welcome.title: Welcome to Livaro!
welcome.subtitle: Your account has been created successfully. Let's get your store connected and set up in just a few minutes.
welcome.connectStoreDesc: Link your Shopify or WooCommerce store
welcome.choosePlanDesc: Select the perfect plan for your business
welcome.goLiveDesc: Start reaching customers in your city

connectStore.title: Connect Your Store
connectStore.subtitle: Link your e-commerce platform to start syncing products and managing your presence on Livaro.
connectStore.helpText: Check out our integration guide to learn how to get your API credentials.

choosePlan.title: Choose Your Plan
choosePlan.subtitle: Select the plan that best fits your business needs. You can change or cancel anytime.

steps.supportText: Our support team is here to assist you with the onboarding process.

team.title: Team Members

roles.adminDesc: Full access to all store settings and team management
roles.editorDesc: Can manage products and view analytics
roles.viewerDesc: Read-only access to store data and analytics

team.noMembersDesc: Invite team members to help manage your store. You can assign different roles and permissions.

hero.title: Curated Luxury
hero.subtitle: Discover exquisite furniture from Europe's finest interior boutiques.

cities.title: Our Cities
cities.subtitle: Bringing together the finest furniture stores in Europe's most beautiful cities.
cities.beFirstToKnow: Be the first to know when we launch in {city}
cities.expanding: We're expanding to new cities every month. Request your city and be the first to know when we launch.

cityDescriptions.bratislava: Eastern European charm and modern luxury

bestsellers.title: Bestsellers
bestsellers.subtitle: Discover the most loved pieces from our curated collection.

categories.title: Shop by Category
categories.subtitle: Handpicked collections from Europe's most prestigious furniture stores.

curatedSelection.title: Curated Selection
curatedSelection.description: Only the finest stores and artisans, handpicked for their exceptional quality and design philosophy.

localExcellence.title: Local Excellence
localExcellence.description: Support your city's finest furniture makers while discovering pieces you'll cherish for years.

expertService.title: Expert Service
expertService.description: Connect directly with store owners who bring decades of expertise and passion to every piece.

partnership.title: Partner with Livaro
partnership.subtitle: Join our exclusive network of premium retailers and reach discerning customers who appreciate exceptional quality.

city.curatedSelection: Curated selection from {city}'s finest furniture stores

product.installmentText: Pay in 3 interest-free installments of {amount} with Klarna or PayPal.
product.requestSent: Request sent! The store will contact you soon.

shipping.deliveryTimeText: Estimated 2-4 weeks depending on your location and product availability.
shipping.shippingCostsText: Calculated at checkout based on delivery address and item size.
shipping.whiteGloveText: Professional delivery and installation services available upon request.
shipping.inStorePickupText: Available at {store} in {city}. Contact store for details.

returns.returnPolicyText: 30-day return period for most items. Product must be unused and in original packaging.
returns.returnShippingText: Contact the store to arrange return pickup. Return shipping fees may apply.
returns.warrantyText: Manufacturer warranty included. Duration varies by product—contact store for specific warranty information.
returns.damageClaimsText: Report any shipping damage within 48 hours of delivery for full resolution.

product.defaultDescription: Experience the perfect blend of form and function with this exquisite piece. Meticulously crafted to enhance your living space, it represents the finest in contemporary European design.
product.defaultProductDetails: This premium piece combines exceptional craftsmanship with contemporary design. Made from high-quality materials, it offers both durability and timeless aesthetic appeal. Perfect for modern living spaces.
product.defaultBrandDescription: Premium furniture brand offering exceptional quality and timeless design.
product.defaultStoreDescription: Premium furniture retailer offering a curated selection of high-quality pieces.

footer.description: Curating exceptional furniture from Europe's finest stores. Discover timeless pieces for your home.

category.exploreSelection: Explore our curated selection of {category} furniture from Europe's finest stores.
